languages.text: {n}Мужчина встречает ярость техножреца, не дрогнув лицом.{/n} "Во вселенной должен быть Генерал-Фабрикатор, высший жрец Омниссии. Иного, кто мог бы им быть, нет. Значит, сие звание — мое".

traits.locale_text: {n}Мужчина встречает ярость техножреца, не дрогнув лицом.{/n} "Во вселенной должен быть Генерал-Фабрикатор, высший жрец Омниссии. Иного, кто мог бы им быть, нет. Значит, сие звание — мое".
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}The man listens to the Tech-Priest's outburst without flinching.{/n} "The universe must have a Fabricator General — the supreme priest of the Omnissiah. There is none other to hold that title. Therefore, it is mine."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина встречает ярость техножреца, не дрогнув лицом.{/n} "Во вселенной должен быть Генерал-Фабрикатор, высший жрец Омниссии. Иного, кто мог бы им быть, нет. Значит, сие звание — мое".

traits.locale_text: {n}The man listens to the Tech-Priest's outburst without batting an eyelid.{/n} "The universe must have a Fabricator-General — the supreme priest of the Omnissiah. There is none other to hold that title. Therefore it's mine."
traits.speaker: Chief

traits.speaker: Chief

traits.speaker: Chief

traits.locale_text: {n}The man listens to the Tech-Priest's outburst without flinching.{/n} "The universe must have a Fabricator General — the supreme priest of the Omnissiah. There is none other to hold that title. Therefore, it is mine."

languages.text: {n}男は激昂する技術司祭にひるむことなく話を聞いている。{/n}「万物には製造総司令、すなわち万機神の最高司祭を用意しなくてはならない。他にこの称号を持つ者はいない。従って、私が任務に就いている」
languages.original_text: {n}The man listens to the Tech-Priest's outburst without flinching.{/n} "The universe must have a Fabricator General — the supreme priest of the Omnissiah. There is none other to hold that title. Therefore, it is mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は激昂する技術司祭にひるむことなく話を聞いている。{/n}「万物には製造総司令、すなわち万機神の最高司祭を用意しなくてはならない。他にこの称号を持つ者はいない。従って、私が任務に就いている」
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}在帕斯卡的怒火前，男人毫不退缩。{/n}“这个宇宙必须得有一位铸造将军，也就是欧姆尼塞亚的最高神甫。这里其他人配不上这个头衔，所以，它就由我来接受了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The man listens to the Tech-Priest's outburst without flinching.{/n} "The universe must have a Fabricator General — the supreme priest of the Omnissiah. There is none other to hold that title. Therefore, it is mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}在帕斯卡的怒火前，男人毫不退缩。{/n}“这个宇宙必须得有一位铸造将军，也就是欧姆尼塞亚的最高祭司。这里其他人配不上这个头衔，所以，它就由我来接受了。”
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}L'homme ne se laisse pas perturber par le coup d'éclat du technoprêtre.{/n} « L'univers doit avoir un fabricator général, le prêtre suprême de l'Omnimessie. Personne d'autre ne peut porter ce titre. Donc il me revient. »
languages.original_text: {n}The man listens to the Tech-Priest's outburst without flinching.{/n} "The universe must have a Fabricator General — the supreme priest of the Omnissiah. There is none other to hold that title. Therefore, it is mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme ne se laisse pas perturber par le coup d'éclat du technoprêtre.{/n} « L'univers doit avoir un fabricator général, le prêtre suprême de l'Omnimessie. Personne d'autre ne peut porter ce titre. Donc il me revient. »
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}El hombre escucha las palabras furiosas del tecnosacerdote sin inmutarse.{/n} «El universo debe contar con un Fabricator General, el sacerdote supremo del Omnissiah. Nadie más puede ostentar ese título. Así pues, es mío».
languages.original_text: {n}The man listens to the Tech-Priest's outburst without flinching.{/n} "The universe must have a Fabricator General — the supreme priest of the Omnissiah. There is none other to hold that title. Therefore, it is mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre escucha las palabras furiosas del tecnosacerdote sin inmutarse.{/n} «El universo debe contar con un Fabricator General, el sacerdote supremo del Omnissiah. Nadie más puede ostentar ese título. Así pues, es mío».
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}Der Mann lauscht dem Ausbruch des Techpriesters völlig reglos.{/n} "Das Universum muss einen Manufactor Principalis haben — den obersten Priester des Omnissiah. Niemand anderes hat diesen Titel inne. Daher ist es der meine."
languages.original_text: {n}The man listens to the Tech-Priest's outburst without flinching.{/n} "The universe must have a Fabricator General — the supreme priest of the Omnissiah. There is none other to hold that title. Therefore, it is mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann lauscht dem Ausbruch des Techpriesters völlig reglos.{/n} "Das Universum muss einen Manufactor Principalis haben — den obersten Priester des Omnissiah. Niemand anderes hat diesen Titel inne. Daher ist es der meine."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}Adam, Tekno Rahip'in patlayışını kılını kıpırdamadan dinliyor.{/n} "Evrende bir Tümfabrikatör, yani Hermesih'in yüce rahibi olmalı. Bu ünvanı taşıyabilecek başka biri yok. Dolayısıyla ünvan benim."
languages.original_text: {n}The man listens to the Tech-Priest's outburst without flinching.{/n} "The universe must have a Fabricator General — the supreme priest of the Omnissiah. There is none other to hold that title. Therefore, it is mine."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adam, Tekno Rahip'in patlamasını kılı bile kıpırdamadan dinliyor.{/n} "Evrende bir Tümfabrikatör, yani Hermesih'in yüce rahibi olmalı. Bu ünvanı taşıyabilecek başka biri yok. Dolayısıyla bana ait."
traits.speaker: Chief
